about_the_game:
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀  "Witness my creation."
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀   
A group of talented individuals take on their ultimate challenge as they enter Kazuri: an institute for those who are gifted in manipulating a natural resource called Flow Energy.
While these individuals uncover the mysteries behind their powers, their lives are bound to change. Throughout their journeys, they will face political and societal conflicts throughout the world of Caelum.

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

Lie of Caelum is a JRPG that focuses on engaging combat and a rich story. This title includes exploration, mini-games, puzzles, and other aspects that even hardcore players will appreciate. Immerse yourself in a nostalgic, mysterious world that expects you to expect the unexpected.

Features:
  • A Turn-based input combo battle system
  • Controller Support via Xinput
  • Hi-octane combat and challenging bosses
  • Weapons, gear, and other items that can either change playstyles or reinforce roles
  • A non-intrusive friendship/relationship system
  • Non-artificial difficulty settings. "Astral" mode for an easier time, and "True" mode for the game's intended difficulty. Both will affect story, enemy behavior, and other combat mechanics
  • Sidequests that relate to the main premise of the game
  • Endgame content
  • Lots and lots of secrets and lore waiting for the brave and adventurous to uncover
  • Minigames™ including a collectible card game
  • BOPPIN' MUSIC™, This is very important
  • Battle Voices
  • Ability to speed up battle animations

*Controls for this game are for keyboard by default and will only show keyboard prompts. If you are using a controller, please be aware of this.

content_descriptors.notes:
Extreme trigger warning. DO NOT play this game if you are offended by displays and/or implications of misogyny, sexual harassment, racism, trauma, suicide, and depression.

Please be also aware that the game will have some sexual acts (implied), partial nudity, and artistic nudity. Some extreme violence may also be displayed at any time during cutscenes. Drugs and alcohol abuse may be present as a part of a narrative.

short_description: Giant robots. Technology abusing magic. Conflict between countries. Join a group of fated individuals and liberate the planet of Caelum from the shackles of its people. Discover the mysteries behind their powers, and dwell in their lives in this Sci-fi JRPG.
